info.task: navigate forwards to checked radio button
info.title: Navigate forwards to a checked radio button in interaction mode

setupScript.name: checkFirstRadioButtonAndSetFocusBeforeRadioGroup
setupScript.description: sets the state of the first radio button to checked, sets focus on a link before the radio group, and hides the group heading

user: Navigate to the first radio button.
instructions.raw: Navigate to the first radio button.
instructions.mode: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: Name of the group, 'Pizza Crust', is conveyed
name of the radio button, 'Regular crust', is conveyed
State of the radio button, 'checked', is conveyed
Position of the radio button, 1, is conveyed
Number of radio buttons in the group, 3, is conveyed
